name: Stewart Henderson, Yvonne Lyon and Carol Henderson present Vesper Sky

shows.title: Vesper Sky
shows.desc:
Vesper Sky is a stunning collection of contemporary folk songs and poems, written and performed by Stewart Henderson, Yvonne Lyon and Carol Henderson. With its wide-ranging, contemporary topics and tempos it is an engrossing and plaintive ‘journal of our times’.

Yvonne Lyon is a singer/songwriter who has fans like Bob Harris, has supported Eddi Reader and co-written with Boo Hewerdine.

Stewart Henderson is a poet, broadcaster and songwriter (and a long-time collaborator and contributor along Greenbelt’s literary curve).

Carol Henderson is a storyteller, broadcaster and practising iconographer with a varied and distinguished background in publishing, theatre and film.
